alert.note: Alert for Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 6:20PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lewis and Clark and northeastern Jefferson Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 620 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Montana City, or 7 miles southeast of Helena, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Helena, Montana City, Clancy, Rimini and Alhambra. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
